examples.text: Radyoloji, radyom ve eletrikle tedavi ve fiziyotrapi müesseseleri hakkındaki kanun mucibince hazırlanan nizamname mer'iyete girmiştir.
examples.translation: The regulations prepared in accordance with the law on radiology, radium, and electrical treatment and physiotherapy institutions have entered into force.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish مرعیت (meriyet), from مرعی (meri), from Arabic مَرْعِيّ (marʕiyy), passive participle of رَعْي (raʕy, “to comply with”).
